top_comments.comment: School aur colleges band karwaya jaaaye humara pesaa doob raha hai woh log humein forcefully vaccinations lene k liye pressure kar rahey hai plzzz modi ji
shut off all coaching and school
UP meq Chunaav hai yaha kuch ni hone wala
Pls be  very careful.while you roam outside your home and pls wear a mask

comments_since_last_sample.body: If there is a third wave, it should have hit 2 - 3 months ago, as peoples in many states have been living normal life since July 21 even without wearing masks.
Yesterday I visited Thane and i was shocked that there was no place to stand and no was wearing masks too...

People r not scared anymore because they were scared enough of 3rd Wave. These r the same people who gave warning for 3rd wave with prediction of 4-5 lakhs cases everyday...which is proved wrong. No doubt there was restrictions but there was restrictions from the beginning. It's a endemic, there is no way it will be over soon.
